```{r}
library(dplyr)
library(tidyr)
library(tinytable)

dir_post <- here::here("blog/2024/04/28/")
data <- arrow::read_parquet(file.path(dir_post, "data", "cleaned.parquet"))
```

```{r}
tab <- data |>
  filter(!is.na(weather), !is.na(gender)) |>
  summarize(n = n(), .by = c(year, gender, weather)) |>  
  pivot_wider(names_from = c(gender, year), values_from = n, names_prefix = "n_") |>
  arrange(weather) |>
  select(weather, starts_with("n_Men"), starts_with("n_Women"))

```

```{r}
tab |>
  `colnames<-`(c("", rep(2019:2023, 2))) |>
  tt() |>
  group_tt(i = list("Good Weather" = 1, "Bad Weather" = 3),
           j = list(" " = 1, "Men" = 2:6, "Women" = 7:11)) |>
  save_tt(file.path(dir_post, "img", "table.pdf"), overwrite = TRUE)
```
